entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
